Title: OpenHack - Migrating Microsoft Workloads to Azure ZH
Description: OpenHack challenges for Migrating Microsoft Workloads to Azure

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 2: Assess workloads for migration
ContentItems.Description: Plan the migration of on-premises workloads to Azure.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 3: Implement hybrid identity
ContentItems.Description: Plan the migration of on-premises identities to Azure Active Directory.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 4: Implement hybrid networking and resilient authentication
ContentItems.Description: Implement site-to-site connectivity between on-premises and Azure and establish resilient authentication.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 5: Test migration
ContentItems.Description: Migrate the on-premises workloads to Azure in a phased manner for testing.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 6: Finalize migration
ContentItems.Description: Migrate the on-premises workloads to Azure and complete the migration.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 7: Transition to platform database services
ContentItems.Description: Migrate a database backend from MS SQL Server to platform database services.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 8: Transition to platform web-hosting services
ContentItems.Description: Migrate exiting websites from IaaS to PaaS with platform web-hosting services.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 9: Secure, optimize, and operate
ContentItems.Description: Optimize an existing environment through the implementation of additional security controls and monitoring.
